thread.title: How to make Lizzie Borden's meatloaf
thread.title_full: How to make Lizzie Borden's meatloaf

title: How to make Lizzie Borden's meatloaf
text:
How to make Lizzie Borden's meatloaf Chicago Tribune October 26, 2015 Updated 5 hours ago 2015-10-26T12:22:01Z 
Here's Lizzie Borden's version of meatloaf: 
1 pound ground steak 
1/2 pound ground pork steak 
1 egg 
Herbs and seasonings to taste. 
Grease tin, cover loaf well with hot water and bake about one hour. Order a reprint of this story Join The Conversation
